alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Fayette; Henry; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 1:21PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Spalding, southeastern Fayette, southern Henry and south central Clayton Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 121 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Birdie, or 8 miles southeast of Fayetteville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Griffin, McDonough, Fayetteville, Hampton, Lovejoy, Locust Grove, Brooks, Woolsey, Sunny Side, East Griffin, Highland Mills, Blacksville, Towalaga, Experiment, Walker Mill, Birdie, Vaughn, Inman, Luella, and Atlanta Motor Speedway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
